participant_2.background:
I write poems about my life and my culture.
I like to read the news and write my own stories.
I'm working on finding a new job and trying to figure out what I want to do with my life.
i don t like feeling obligated to hang out with someone.
i am a writer.

content.text: Hey! How is your day going?
Pretty good, I am just chilling at home. What about you?
I am just getting ready for work. I work at a local bakery.
That sounds cool, I love to bake. I am a writer.
Oh really? That's awesome. What do you like to write about?
I like to write poems about my life and my culture. I also like to write my own stories.
That's really cool. I don't know much about writing, but I really enjoy reading.
Reading is great! I love to read the news and learn about what's going on in the world.
Yeah, I like to keep up on current events too. I also like to read fiction and non-fiction books.
I like to read fiction too. I love to get lost in a good book.
Me too. I love books that make me feel like I'm a part of the story.
That's what I love about reading too.
Do you have any favorite authors?
I have a lot of favorite authors, but some of my favorites are Toni Morrison, Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie, and Maya Angelou.
Those are great authors! I love Toni Morrison's books.
Me too! She's such a talented writer.
I'm excited to hear more about your writing. Maybe we can talk about it more sometime.
Yeah, that would be great! I'd love to hear more about your baking too.
